channel.title: CashIn command (to cash in PVP points for cash instead of rights)
channel.description:
I'm using Delta(317), I believe, and I want to know if there's a way that you can cash in pvp points for plain cash, like each point is 500k or something. You can already use them to get rights to weild like D-Claws and GS n st00f... but in case they already had it, y'no?
So, it would be like:
Has 30 pts...*Types ::cashin* gets 15m. Now has 0 pts.
OR... Has 30 pts... *Types ::cashin 6* gets 3m, now has 24 pts.
If you understand what i'm saying, could you help, please? :D

item.title: CashIn command (to cash in PVP points for cash instead of rights)
item.dc:creator: @PushedPrawn PushedPrawn
item.description:
@PushedPrawn wrote:

I’m using Delta(317), I believe, and I want to know if there’s a way that you can cash in pvp points for plain cash, like each point is 500k or something. You can already use them to get rights to weild like D-Claws and GS n st00f… but in case they already had it, y’no?

So, it would be like:

Has 30 pts…Types ::cashin gets 15m. Now has 0 pts.

OR… Has 30 pts… Types ::cashin 6 gets 3m, now has 24 pts.

If you understand what i’m saying, could you help, please?
